sentences.text: IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING THE AVAILABILITY OF PROXY MATERIALS FOR THE  REGULAR MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD ON JUNE 13, 2017:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Notice of 2017 Regular Meeting of Shareholders and Proxy Statement and our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended January 28, 2017, are available at www.proxyvote.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Help us make a difference by eliminating paper proxy mailings to your home or business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As permitted by rules adopted by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commissio "SEC"), we are furnishing proxy materials to our shareholders primarily via the internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about May 1, 2017, we mailed to our shareholders a Notice of Internet  Availability containing instructions on how to access our proxy materials, including our proxy statement and our Annual Report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability also  ncludes instructions to access your form of proxy to vote via the internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain shareholders, in accordance with their prior requests, have received e-  mail notification of how to access our proxy materials and vote via the internet or have been mailed paper copies of our proxy materials and proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet distribution of our proxy materials is designed to expedite receipt by our shareholders, lower the cost of the Regular Meeting of Shareholders and conserve  precious natural resources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would prefer to receive paper proxy materials, please follow the instructions included in the Notice of Internet Availability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have  previously elected to receive our proxy materials electronically, you will continue to receive email notification with instructions to access these materials via the internet  unless you elect otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Forward-Looking and Cautionary Statements of the Private Securities Litigation Reform A
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995 as contained in Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933 and  Section 2 IE of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 that reflect managements current views and estimates regarding future market conditions, company performance and financial results, business  prospects, new strategies, the competitive environment and other events.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can identify these statements by the fact that they use words such as anticipate, believe, assume, estimate,  expect, intend, project, guidance, plan, outlook, and other words and terms of similar meaning.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These statements involve a number of risks and uncertainties that could cause actual results  to differ materially from the potential results discussed in the forward-looking statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among the factors that could cause actual results and outcomes to differ materially from those contained in  such forward-looking statements are the following: macro-economic conditions (including fluctuations in housing prices, oil markets and jobless rates), conditions in the industries and categories in  which we operate, changes in consumer preferences or confidence, changes in consumer spending and debt levels, the mix of products and services offered for sale in our physical stores and online,  credit market changes and constraints, product availability, trade restrictions or changes in the costs of imports, competitive initiatives of competitors (including pricing actions and promotional  activities), strategic and business decisions of our vendors (including actions that could impact promotional support, product margin and/or supply), the success of new product launches, the impact of  pricing investments and promotional activity, weather, natural or man-made disasters, attacks on our data systems, the companys ability to prevent or react to a disaster recovery situation, changes in  law or regulations, changes in tax rates, changes in taxable income in each jurisdiction, tax audit developments and resolution of other discrete tax matters, foreign currency fluctuation, the companys  ability to manage its property portfolio, the impact of labor markets, the companys ability to retain qualified employees and management, failure to achieve anticipated expense and cost reductions,  disruptions in our supply chain, the costs of procuring goods the company sells, failure to achieve anticipated revenue and profitability increases from operational and restructuring changes (including  investments in our multi-channel capabilities), inability to secure or maintain favorable vendor terms, failure to accurately predict the duration over which we will incur costs, development of new  businesses, failure to complete or achieve anticipated benefits of announced transactions, and our ability to protect information relating to our employees and customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A further list and description of  these risks, uncertainties and other matters can be found in the companys annual report and other reports filed from time to time with the Securities and Exchange Commission(SEC), including, but  not limited to, Best Buys Report on Form 10-K filed with the SEC on March 24, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Best Buy cautions that the foregoing list of important factors is not complete, and any forward-looking  statements speak only as of the date they are made, and Best Buy assumes no obligation to update any forward-looking statement that it may make.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROXY SUMMARY
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At our upcoming 2017 Regular Meeting of Shareholders, we are asking shareholders to vote on five key items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This summary provides context for those items and highlights why  we are asking you to vote in alignment with the recommendations of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The context includes a review of our fiscal 2017 financial and strategic performance, an introduction to the new phase of our Company strategy and an overview of our corporate governance program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we summarize the items of business for which we are requesting your  vote and provide further information to help you consider those items.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to review the entire proxy statement for more detail on these items, as well as our Annual  Report and our Chairman and CEO's Letter to Shareholders posted on our website at www.inusstors.bestbuy.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fiscal 2017 Performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2017 we delivered strong financial performance for our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Fiscal 2017 was the third year in a row that the Company grew its Domestic comparable sales  and operating income.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We delivered the topline performance we outlined at the beginning of the year - with materially better earnings growth than originally expected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On fiscal  2017 Enterprise revenue of $39.4 billion, we increased our GAAP operating income rate from 3.5% in fiscal 2016 to 4.7% in fiscal 2017 and our GAAP diluted earnings per share  (EPS) from continuing operations by 63% from $2.30 in fiscal 2016 to $3.74 in fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-GAAP operating income rate increased from 4.0% in fiscal 2016 to 4.5% in  fiscal 2017 and non-GAAP diluted EPS from continuing operations grew 23% from $2.73 in fiscal 2016 to $3.56 in fiscal 2017.*
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved these results in fiscal 2017 by executing against our three priorities for the year: (1) build on our strong industry position and multi-channel cap abilities to drive the  existing business; (2) drive cost reduction and efficiencies; and (3) advance key initiatives to drive future growth and differentiation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Successful execution against these priorities drove our positive results for the year and included the following achievements: (1) gains in market share, which offset overall market  declines; (2) an increase in our Net Promoter Score by over 350 basis points; (3) domestic segment online comparable sales growth of 20.3%; (4) a successful transformation in  Canada re suiting in international segment GAAP operating income of $90 million (compared to a loss of $210 million in fiscal 2016); (5) $350 million in cumulative savings  against a three-year target of $400 million; and (6) successful testing of several compelling customer experience concepts, a number of which will be rolled out across our stores in  the coming year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Looking Ahead - Best Buy 2020: Building the New Blue
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In November 2012, we introduced our transformation strategy called Renew Blue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since initiating Renew Blue, we have stabilized comparable sales, increased our operating  income rate, achieved substantial growth in our diluted EPS from continuing operations and delivered significant improvement in our return on assets and non-GAAP return on  invested capital.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: * The progress made over the past four years supports our recent announcement to conclude our Renew Blue efforts and formally enter the new phase of our  business strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Best Buy 2020: Building the New Blue (Best Buy 2020).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our customers are at the core of Best Buy 2020.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Technology continues to evolve, creating more excitement and opening up an increasing range of possibilities for our customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It  is also creating more complexity and we believe many of our customers need our help.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our purpose is to help customers pursue their passions and enrich their lives with the help of technology.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We want to play two roles for them: be their trusted adviser and solution provider; and be their source for technology services for their home.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our customer value  proposition is to be the leading technology expert who makes it easy for our customers to learn about and confidently enjoy the best technology.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From a financial standpoint, the equation that we are seeking to solve with Best Buy 2020 is to gradually increase our rate of topline growth, pursue material ongoing cost savings  necessary to both offset inflationary pressures and fund investments and build a more predictable set of revenue streams with a foundation of recurring revenues and stickier
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: https://www.sec.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000764478/00007644731700001 l/bbydefirativeprcray2017.htm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: customer relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are three growth pillars we will be pursuing as part of Best Buy 2020:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Maximize the multi-channel retail business;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000764478/000076447817000011/bbydefinitiveproxy2017.htm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Document
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Provide services and solutions that solve real customer needs and help us build deeper customer relationships; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accelerate growth in our International segment, consisting of Canada and Mexico
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Regarding the first pillar, Maximize the multi-channel retail business, we plan to continue to enhance the customer experience and increase revenue by growing both existing and  new channels, by growing certain key product categories, as well as by developing broader, stickier customer relationships.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As for the second pillar, Provide services and solutions that solve real customer needs, we plan to meet the significant technical support needs of customers across their home,  without regard to where they may have purchased their technology products.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also plan to offer more complete solutions to our customers that meet their underlying needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For  example, instead of  just selling security cameras, we are beginning to sell a security monitoring and home automation service in certain markets across the country.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our third pillar concerns our transformation efforts in Canada and Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In both cases, the multichannel improvements we have made, along with the services-related  experimentation we have undertaken in Canada, give us reasons to believe that a key part of Best Buy 2020 will be derived from the opportunity to accelerate our growth in both  markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With the launch of Best Buy 2020, fiscal 2018 will revolve around the following four priorities:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Explore and pursue growth opportunities around the pillars described above; for example:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) innovate digital capabilities to effectively assist customers;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) pursue growth in  key product categories, including categories such as connected home, appliances and mobile;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) expand our in-home advisor ("IHA") program, in which customers receive a  free in-home consultation with an experienced technology advisor who can identify their needs, design personalized solutions and become a personal resource over time;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (d)  continue to test new compelling customer experience concepts around the country; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (e) pursue international segment growth by continuing to drive our online channel and  expand successful store remodels in Canada and open new stores in Mexico.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Improve our execution in key areas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe we continue to have significant opportunities from improving our sales effectiveness and proficiency, our supply chain for  large product fulfillment and small package delivery and our services fulfillment capabilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Continue to reduce costs and drive efficiencies through the business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As stated previously, we have achieved $350 million of our current $400 million cost reduction target We are working on the next phase of cost savings and will provide updates on the next goal once we complete our current program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Build the capabilities necessary to deliver on the first three priorities, which will involve making investments in people and systems to drive growth, execution and  efficiencies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we work to continue to strengthen and grow our business, we remain committed to our previously articulated capital allocation strategy which is to first fund operations and  growth investments, including potential partnerships and acquisitions and then to return the remaining excess free cash flow to our shareholders over time with dividends and share  repurchases, while maintaining investment grade credit metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2017, we continued our long-term capital allocation strategy with an emphasis on returns to shareholders by returning $1.2 billion through dividends and share  repurchases.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2017 we increased our dividend 22% to $0.28 per share, repurchased $743 million against our previously announced two-year, $1 billion share repurchase  program and paid a special dividend of $0.45 per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This decision followed our shareholder-focused actions in fiscal 2016 when we returned $1.5 billion to our shareholders  through $1 billion in share repurchases, $320 million in regular quarterly dividends, a 21% increase per share and a special dividend of $180 million or $0.51 per share.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In March  2017, we announced the continuation of this strategy for fiscal 2018 by way of a 21% increase in our quarterly dividend to $0.34 per share and our plan to spend $3 billion on share  repurchases over the next two years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This plan accelerates our repurchases over the next two years over what we originally planned.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000764478/00007644781700001 l/bbydefinitiveproxy2017.htm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Document
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As we embark on Best Buy 2020, our Board of Directors continues to play a critical role in shaping and supporting our strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2017, this role included a budget and  capital plan review at the beginning of the fiscal year and an extended strategic offsite mid-year to review and discuss management's long-term plan for growing the Company and  creating shareholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000764478/000076447817000011/bbydefinitiveproxy2017.htm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Document
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also during fiscal 2017, in consideration of shareholder dialogue and best practices, the Board engaged an independent third-party consultant as part of its annual Board evaluation  process to conduct individual interviews with each director and certain senior executives and perform a comprehensive analysis of the Board's governance, structure, evaluation  process and overall effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results were positive and confirmed our Board's commitment to high levels of Board effectiveness and governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This review helped us  shape the focus of our Board's work as we continue to move ahead.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These actions are consistent with and a product of our longstanding approach to corporate governance, which is to develop and implement principles that: (1) support the success of  the Companys strategy and business objectives;(2) are rooted in a robust ongoing dialogue with our shareholders; and (3) are inspired by best practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with this  approach, we continue to build upon a strong framework of corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some key points regarding our Board and governance policies and practices are as  follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Structure ^  Lead Independent Director s All Independent Committees s  Predominantly Independent Board (90%) s No Director Related Party Transactions s  Annual Director Elections V Balance of Tenure and Gender Diversity among Directors ^  Robust Annual Board Evaluation Process s High Shareholder Support for Directors s  Majority Vote for Directors Director Retirement Policy Shareholder Rights Compensation s  No Cumulative Voting Rights Annual Say-on-Pay Vote s  No Poison Pill s Anti-Hedging and Pledging Policies s  Special Meeting Threshold of 10% (25% if related to a business combination) s Director & Executive Officer Stock Ownership Guidelines s  No Exclusive Forum/Venue or Fee-shifting Provisions Clawback Provisions on both Cash and Equity Awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More information on our Corporate Governance policies and practices can be found in the Corporate Governance section of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Engagement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A key part of our corporate governance program is our robust annual shareholder engagement process, which continued to be a priority in fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We reached out to all of our  top 20 shareholders, representing approximately 70% of the outstanding shares, as well as several other of our top 50 shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We engaged in discussions with several of our  top shareholders and generally received positive feedback about our performance, corporate governance and compensation practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This support was evident at our 2016 Meeting,  when all Items of Business received over 94% support from shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our typical engagement follows a seasonal cycle, as outlined below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional information can be found  in the Corporate Governance  Shareholder Engagement section of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Review of feedback received from shareholders at our annual meeting and  current trends in governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Primary engagement season with focus on our top 20 shareholders and proxy  advisory firms through both in-person and telephonic conversations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Company participants include representatives from Legal, Investor Relations  and Human Resources - Rewards.

sentences.text: Items of Business for Vote at our Regular Meeting of Shareholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year, we are requesting shareholder support in alignment with the recommendations of our Board of Directors for the following Items of Business:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Item Number Item Description Board Recommendation 1  Election of Directors  FOR Each  Nomin We have ten director nominees standing for election this year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will find more information about our nominees' qualifications and experience  starting on page 25.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2  Ratification of Appointment of our Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm  FOR We are asking our shareholders to ratify the appointment of Deloitte & Touche LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal  2018.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3  Advisory Vote to Approve our Named Executive Officer Compensation  FOR For the seventh year, we are seeking advisory approval by our shareholders of our named executive officer compensation, the "Say on Pay" vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In  evaluating this proposal, please review our Compensation Discussion & Analysis ("CD&A"), which begins on page 39 and describes how we have  engaged with shareholders and the compensation decisions of our Compensation and Human Resources Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4  Advisory Vote on the Frequency of Holding the Shareholder Advisory Vote to Approve Executive Compensation  EVERY YEAR We are required to offer our shareholders an opportunity to tell us how often they wish to vote on our named executive officer compensation, the "Say  When on Pay" vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2011, in response to shareholder feedback, the Board determined to hold this vote every year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recommend this annual vote  frequency continue.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional information on this Say When on Pay vote is included on page 69.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5  Approval of our Amended and Restated 2014 Omnibus Incentive Plan  FOR We are requesting shareholder approval of our amended and restated 2014 Omnibus Incentive Plan (the "amended 2014 Plan"), our primary vehicle  to award long-term incentive-based compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amendments primarily focus on a request for additional shares under the Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In-depth detail  about the amended 2014 Plan can be found beginning on page 70 .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of these matters, for various reasons, play an important role in how we operate and we value shareholder input regarding our corporate governance (including our director  nominees and auditor selection) and our executive compensation (including our Named Executive Officer compensation structure, the frequency of the shareholder vote on that  structure and our equity incentive plan used as part of our compensation structure).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Summary information regarding our director nominees and executive compensation is provided  below and additional detail regarding each item can be found in the relevant section of this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year we will be conducting our 2017 Regular Meeting of Shareholders exclusively online as a live virtual shareholder meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this approach provides our  shareholders the option to attend from locations convenient to them, while still maintaining access to our Board of Directors and management through the ability to submit questions  on our virtual shareholder forum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a technology leader, conducting our annual meeting virtually is consistent with our approach of connecting technology and consumers and  provides resource efficiencies.

sentences.text: Overview of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As supported by the financial results outlined above, we utilize a pay-for-performance compensation structure that provides stable compensation practices with a strong focus on  performance outcomes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the past six years, our shareholders have had an annual opportunity to share their opinion of our compensation practices through a non-binding advisory  M Say on Pay  vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This year, we again ask for our shareholders' support of our executive compensation practices and look forward to receiving feedback on our program and  practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also believe an annual vote continues to be in the best interest of our shareholders and recommend that shareholders support that practice for the "Say When on Pay"  frequency vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, we are requesting approval of our Amended and Restated 2014 Omnibus Incentive Plan, our primary vehicle for awarding performance-based compensation  to our employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Subject to shareholder approval, the 2014 Plan was amended to increase the number of shares available for issuance pursuant to the amended 2014 Plan  provisions, which are also summarized within this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For more information, see the Executive and Director Compensation  Compensation Discussion and Analysis, Item of  Business No. 3  Advisory Vote to Approve Named  Executive Officer Compensation, Item of  Business No. 4  Advisory Vote on the Frequency of  Holding the Shareholder Advisory Vote to Approve Named Executive Officer  Compensation and Item 5  Approval of  our Amended and Restated 2014 Omnibus Incentive Plan sections in this proxy statement.

sentences.text: REGULAR MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS  JUNE 13, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: GENERAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement is furnished in connection with the solicitation of proxies by the Board of Directors ("Board") of Best Buy Co., Inc. ("Best Buy," "we," "us," "our" or the  "Company") to be voted at our 2017 Regular Meeting of Shareholders (the "Meeting") to be held virtually on Tuesday, June 13, 2017, at 9:00 a.m., Central Time, at  www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/BBY2017 or at any postponement or adjournment of the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy materials, including the proxy statement, our Annual Report and  form of proxy or the Notice of Internet Availability, were mailed to you beginning on or about May 1, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Background
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the purpose of  the Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Meeting, shareholders will vote on the items of business outlined in the Notice of 2017 Regular Meeting of Shareholders ("Meeting Notice") included as the cover page to  this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, management will report on our business and respond to questions from shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive this proxy statement and a proxy card or the Notice of  Internet Availability?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You received this proxy statement and a proxy card or the Notice of Internet Availability because you owned shares of Best Buy common stock as of April 17, 2017, the record date  for the Meeting and are entitled to vote on the items of business at the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement describes the items of business that will be voted on at the Meeting and  provides information on these items so that you can make an informed decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How can I attend the Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can attend the meeting online by logging on to www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/BBY2017 and following the instructions provided on your proxy or notice card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to vote at the Meeting, you must have been a shareholder of record of Best Buy as of April 17, 2017, which is the record date for the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in  "street name" (that is, through a bank, broker or other nominee), you will receive instructions from the bank, broker or nominee that you must follow in order for your shares to be  voted as you choose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When is the record date?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has established April 17, 2017, as the record date for the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many shares of  Best Buy common stock are outstanding?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the record date, there were 307,410,253 shares of Best Buy common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no other classes of capital stock outstanding.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On what items of  business am I voting?

sentences.text: The election of the ten directors listed herein for a term of one year expiring in 2018;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ratification of the appointment of Deloitte & Touche, LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending February 3, 2018;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The non-binding advisory vote to approve our named executive officer compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The advisory vote on the frequency of holding the shareholder advisory vote on our executive compensation;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The approval of our amended and restated 2014 Omnibus Incentive Plan; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such other business as may properly come before the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board recommends that you vote your shares:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the election of directors as set forth in this proxy statement;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the ratification of the appointment of Deloitte & Touche, LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending February 3, 2018;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR the non-binding advisory vote to approve our named executive officer compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ONE YEAR on the frequency of the shareholder advisory vote on our named executive officer compensation; an
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FOR our amended and restated 2014 Omnibus Incentive Plan.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How do I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a shareholder of record (that is, if your shares are owned in your name and not in  street name), you may vote:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Via the internet at www.proxyvote.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By mail, by signing and returning the enclosed proxy card if you have received paper materials; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By attending the virtual Meeting and voting online during the Meeting at www.virtualshareholdermeeting.com/BBY2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: f your shares are held in a brokerage account by a broker, bank or other nominee, you should follow the voting instructions provided by your broker, bank or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you wish to vote by telephone or via the internet, you must do so before 11:59 p.m., Eastern Time, on Monday, June 12, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After that time, telephone and internet voting on  www.proxyvote.com will not be permitted and any shareholder of record wishing to vote thereafter must vote online during the Meeting.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the SEC rules, we are making available to all shareholders who have not affirmatively opted to receive paper materials, all of their proxy materials via the  internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, you may opt to receive paper copies of proxy materials, at no cost to you, by following the instructions contained in the Notice of Internet Availability that we  have mailed to most shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We encourage you to take advantage of the option to vote your shares electronically through the internet or by telephone.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Doing so will result in  cost savings for the Company.

sentences.text: How are my voting instructions carried out?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When you vote via proxy, you appoint the Chairman of the Board, Hubert Joly and the Secretary of the Company, Keith J. Nelsen (collectively, the "Proxy Agents"), as your  representatives to vote at the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Proxy Agents will vote your shares at the Meeting, or at any postponement or adjournment of the Meeting, as you have instructed them  on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you return a properly executed proxy card without specific voting instructions, the Proxy Agents will vote your shares in accordance with the Board's  recommendations as disclosed in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you submit a proxy, your shares will be voted regardless of whether you attend the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the  Meeting, it is advisable to vote your shares via proxy in advance of the Meeting in case your plans change.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If an item properly comes up for vote at the Meeting, or at any postponement or adjournment of the Meeting, that is not described in the Meeting Notice, including adjournment of  the Meeting and any other matters incident to the conduct of the Meeting, the Proxy Agents will vote the shares subject to your proxy in their discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Discretionary authority for them to do so is contained in the proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes do I have?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You have one vote for each share you own, and you can vote those shares for each item of business to be addressed at the Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many shares must be present to hold a valid Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For us to hold a valid Meeting, we must have a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to have a quorum, a majority of the outstanding shares of our common stock that are entitled to vote need to be  present or represented by proxy at the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares will be counted as present at the Meeting if you:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote prior to the Meeting via the internet or by telephone;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: properly submit a proxy card (even if you do not provide voting instructions); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: vote while attending the Meeting online.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes, as defined below, will be included in determining the presence of a quorum at the Meeting so long as there is at least one routine matter which the broker, bank or other nominee can vote on, as is the case with the Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, abstentions on any matter are included in determining the presence of a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes are required to approve an item of  business and what are the effects of  abstentions and broker non-votes on the voting results?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to our Amended and Restated Articles of Incorporation ("Articles") and our Amended and Restated By-laws ("By-laws"), each item of business to be voted on by the  shareholders at the Meeting, with the exception of Item 1, requires the affirmative vote of the holders of a majority of the voting power of the shares of Best Buy common stock  present at a meeting and entitled to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Item 1, the election of directors, requires the affirmative vote of a majority of votes cast with respect to the director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this section of our proxy statement, we provide detail on specific aspects of our Corporate Governance program, policies and practices, as well as additional information on the  operations and composition of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is led by our Chairman and CEO, Mr. Joly, as well as by our Lead Independent Director, Mr. Fradin.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Lead Independent Director role was established in January 2010  in order to provide independent leadership on the Board during times when our Chairman is not independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional leadership roles continue to be filled by other directors, all  of whom are independent and continue to play an active role in our strategic planning, risk oversight and governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe this leadership structure is ideally suited to this  stage of our growth transformation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board leadership duties and responsibilities are outlined below and in our Corporate Governance Principles, which are also posted online at  w w w .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: in v e sto rs, b estb u y.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: co m .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chairman is responsible for: (1) setting the agenda for Board meetings (in partnership with the Lead Independent Director) and presiding over and leading discussion at  meetings of the full Board; (2) presiding over the Company's annual meeting of shareholders; (3) Board oversight and setting the Board meeting calendar; (4) building the  Company's strategy with the Board and carrying it out with management; (5) ensuring the Board has sufficient oversight of the Company's risks; (6) speaking on behalf of the  Company to both internal and external stakeholders, as appropriate; and (7) serving as the Board's liaison to management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The duties of our Lead Independent Director include: (1) partnering with the Chairman to set the Board meeting agenda and being available for ongoing counsel to the Chairman  regarding key items of business; (2) presiding at all Board meetings at which the Chairman is not present; (3) presiding at executive sessions of independent directors (which take  place at each regular Board meeting); (4) calling additional meetings of the independent directors, as appropriate; (5) serving as a stakeholder liaison on behalf of the independent  directors by being available for direct consultation and communication with interested parties, as appropriate; (6) being available for ongoing counsel to the Chairman regarding key  items of business and overall Board functions; and (7) performing other such duties as may be requested from time to time by the Board as a whole, the independent directors and  the Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Both our Chairman and our Lead Independent Director partner with the Chair of our Nominating, Corporate Governance and Public Policy Committee to conduct individual director  assessment as part of the annual Board evaluation process, and perform such other functions and responsibilities as set forth in the Corporate Governance Principles or as requested  by the Board from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Lead Independent Director is nominated by the Nominating, Corporate Governance and Public Policy Committee, and final selection is subject to ratification by the vote of a  majority of the independent directors on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Independent Director serves for an annual term beginning at the Board meeting following the first Regular Meeting of  Shareholders at which directors are elected.

sentences.text: Under our director independence standards described above, the Board has determined that each director who served during any part of fiscal 2017 and each director nominee is  independent, with the exception of Mr. Joly, our Chairman and CEO.

sentences.text: Our Board is responsible for oversight of enterprise risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board considers enterprise risk factors as critical in its review of business strategy and performance and ensures that there is an appropriate balance of risk and opportunity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board approaches its risk oversight responsibilities by reviewing managements assessment of enterprise risks based on internal and external factors and ensuring appropriate  Board oversight of ongoing management efforts to address those risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the day-to-day risk management processes, including assessing and taking  actions necessary to manage risk incurred in connection with the operation of our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management then reviews significant enterprise risks and our general risk management  strategy with the Board as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000764478/000076447817000011/bbydefinitiveproxy2017.htm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Document
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Key strategic risk factors, such as the competitive environment, strategic prioritization, and global brand issues, are considered by the full Board as part of the Boards  overall review of the Companys strategy and strategic plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks associated with our financial reporting processes, legal and regulatory compliance, data privacy and security (including cyber-security) and other operational matters are reviewed by our Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks associated with our compensation plans, benefits and management succession are reviewed by our Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks associated with our investment portfolio, capital markets and liquidity are reviewed by our Finance and Investment Policy Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risks associated with our Board processes, corporate governance, public policy and social responsibility are reviewed by our Nominating Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk items reviewed in Board committees are then escalated to the full Board as necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also oversees management's processes to identify and quantify the material risks that we face.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with its risk oversight role, the Audit Committee  meets privately with representatives of our independent registered public accounting firm, our internal audit staff and our legal staff.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our internal audit staff, who report directly to  the Audit Committee at least quarterly, assist management in identifying, evaluating and implementing risk management controls and procedures to address identified risks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Risk Assessment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In connection with their oversight of compensation-related risks, Compensation Committee members annually review the most important enterprise risks to ensure that  compensation programs do not encourage risk-taking that is reasonably likely to have a material adverse effect on us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As in past years, the review process in fiscal 2017 identified  our existing risk management framework and the key business risks that may materially affect us, reviewed all compensation plans and identified those plans that are most likely to  impact these risks or introduce new risks, and balanced these risks against our existing processes and compensation program safeguards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The review process also took into account  mitigating features contained within our compensation plan design, which includes elements such as:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: metric-based pay;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: metric-based pay;   time matching performance periods;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: time matching perfor   payment for outputs;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: payment for outputs;   goal diversification;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: stock ownership guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: payment caps; an
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: payment caps; a   clawbacks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee also considered additional controls outside of compensation plan design which contribute to risk mitigation, including the independence of our  performance measurement teams and our internal control environment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based upon the process we employed, the Compensation Committee determined that our compensation programs do not encourage risk-taking that is reasonably likely to result in a  material adverse effect on the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2017, the Board held four regular meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each incumbent director attended, in person or by telephone, at least 75% of the meetings of both the Board and  committees on which he or she served, and the average attendance of all directors was 98%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors are required to attend our Regular Meetings of Shareholders, and all director  nominees attended the 2016 Meeting.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to promote open discussion among independent directors, the Board has a policy of conducting executive sessions of independent directors during each regularly scheduled  Board meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2017, our Lead Independent Director, Mr.

sentences.text: Board Evaluation Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating Committee oversees the evaluation of the performance of the Board, its committees and individual directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On an annual basis, members of the Board complete a  questionnaire evaluating the performance of the Board as a whole, each members respective committee, and the performance of the Chairman and Lead Independent Director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  questionnaire reflects responsibilities and roles as outlined within the Corporate Governance Principles and each committees respective charter, as well as more general  performance-related questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committee reviews the results of these questionnaires and determines whether the results warrant any action.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The results and any  proposed action are then shared with the full Board for further discussion and approval of final action plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Chair of our Nominating Committee, the Board Chairman, and the Lead Independent Director conduct individual director assessments to review each directors  contributions to the Board during the past year and his or her performance against the director qualification standards and Board needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of this process, the Nominating  Committee Chair conducts confidential interviews with each director on an annual basis to discuss each director's engagement and desire to continue service, as well as their  feedback on Board effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committee also annually reviews the skills and qualifications of the Board members and the strategic goals of the Company to  determine whether the skills on the Board continue to align with the Companys strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The interviews, board composition analysis and individual assessments are utilized by the  Nominating Committee to assess whether a director should continue to serve on the Board and stand for re-election at the next Regular Meeting of Shareholders and to otherwise  address Board composition needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2017, in addition to the process described above, the Nominating Committee engaged an independent third-party consultant to conduct individual interviews with each  director and certain senior executives and perform a comprehensive analysis of the Board's governance structure, evaluation process and overall effectiveness.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Committee  anticipates utilizing this approach periodically to obtain independent assessments of its performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO Evaluation Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Compensation Committee conducts a robust annual CEO evaluation process, consisting of both a performance review and a compensation analysis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The performance evaluation component includes an assessment of the Company's performance in light of set objectives, personal interviews with the individual Board members and the CEO's direct reports, 360 feedback evaluations provided by over 30 individuals who interact with the CEO, and a detailed CEO self-assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Separately, the Company's Human Resources consultant  conducts extensive market research.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO compensation market data is collected from Fortune 100 companies, the retail industry generally, and our peer group to ensure both  market competitiveness and appropriateness of our CEO's compensation relative to his peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee's independent consultant reviews the market data and  provides its recommendations to the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Once all of the relevant performance and compensation data has been collected, the Compensation Committee meets in executive session to discuss the CEO performance evaluation results and CEO compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After reviewing all of the collected data regarding performance, the Compensation  Committee makes its decision regarding CEO compensation for the forthcoming year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee then provides its final assessment on CEO performance and  decision regarding CEO compensation to the Board for discussion during executive session.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chairman and CEO abstains from participating in all related discussions of the  Compensation Committee and Board prior to delivery of the final assessment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Orientation and Continuing Education
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Nominating Committee oversees the orientation and continuing education of our directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director orientation familiarizes directors with our strategic plans, significant  financial, accounting and risk management issues, compliance programs, policies, principal officers, internal auditors and our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  orientation also addresses Board procedures, director responsibilities, our Corporate Governance Principles and our Board committee charters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also offer continuing education programs and provide opportunities to attend commercial director education seminars outside of the Company to assist our directors in  maintaining their expertise in areas related to the work of the Board and the directors' committee assignments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-Hedging and Anti-Pledging Policies
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive officers and Board members are prohibited from pledging Company securities as collateral for a loan or from holding Company securities in a margin account.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The  Board recently strengthened the policy by removing the ability for the Compensation Committee to approve exceptions in advance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, all employees and Board members  are prohibited from hedging Company securities, including by way of forward contracts, equity swaps, collars, exchange funds or otherwise.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Stock Ownership
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Historically, our stock ownership guidelines have required each of our non-management directors to own 10,000 shares and to hold 50% of their granted equity until that ownership  target is met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2014, we began granting directors restricted stock units subject to a holding requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors must hold these units during their Board tenure until their  service on the Board ends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2017, all of our non-management directors were in compliance with the ownership guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stock ownership guidelines for executive  officers are discussed in the Executive and Director Compensation Compensation Discussion and Analysis  Executive Compensation Elements  Other Compensation section.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder Engagement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We regularly engage with our shareholders on a variety of topics throughout the year to ensure we are addressing their questions and concerns, to seek input and to provide  perspective on Company policies and practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have taken several actions in recent years in consideration of shareholder feedback elicited during this process, including:  declassification of our Board, the determination to hold the advisory vote on our executive compensation on an annual basis, adjustments to the director appointments on our Board  committees, and the development of our corporate social responsibility program and reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also continue to facilitate direct shareholder communication with management  and members of our Board and the ability to easily access and obtain information regarding our Company on our website at www.investors.bestbuy.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see Executive and  Director Compensation  Introduction for more information regarding actions taken as a result of shareholder feedback received regarding our prior year's executive compensation  decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Public Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a leading global retailer and corporate citizen, we believe that it is important to work with policymakers on issues impacting our customers, employees, businesses, shareholders  and communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We know that collaboration helps bring about change that better serves our communities where we live and work.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our public policy work directly aligns with our  aspiration to be environmentally and socially accountable for our brands and business operations worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fiscal 2017, our public policy priorities included: marketplace  fairness, financial services, cybersecurity and data privacy, competitive workplace, supply chain, energy & environment, and emerging technologies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More information about these  priorities, as well as our annual political activity reports and related policies can be found at https://corporate.bestbuy.com under "Government Affairs."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our By-laws provide that our Board consist of one or more directors and that the number of directors may be increased or decreased from time to time by the affirmative vote of a  majority of the directors serving at the time that the action is taken.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The number of directors on our Board is reviewed and set by our Board no less often than annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In March  2017, the Board set the number of directors at ten, based on the number of directors currently serving.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will continue to evaluate the size of the Board and make  adjustments as needed to meet the current and future needs of the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Nomination Process
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committee is responsible for screening and recommending to the full Board director candidates for nomination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committee often engages a third- party search firm to assist in identifying appropriate candidates to consider as additions to our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the Board is seeking to fill an open director position, the Nominating  Committee will also consider nominations received from our shareholders, provided that proposed candidates meet the requisite director qualification standards discussed within  this section of our proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When the Board elects to add a director to the Board, the Nominating Committee will announce the search and post any additional search criteria on our website a  w w .

sentences.text: b e s tb u y .

sentences.text: c o m .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Candidates recommended by shareholders, if qualified, will be considered in the same manner as any other candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committee will then evaluate the resumes of any qualified candidates recommended by search firms or shareholders, as well as by members of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All  candidates are evaluated based on the director qualification standards and the current and future needs of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholder nominations must be accompanied by a candidate resume that addresses the extent to which the nominee meets the director qualification standards and any additional  search criteria posted on our website.

sentences.text: Director Qualification Standards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In seeking new board members, we focus on adding new skills and experiences necessary to oversee the Company's business strategy and fulfill the Board's risk oversight  obligations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our objective is to identify and retain directors that can effectively develop the Company's strategy and oversee management's execution of that strategy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We only  consider director candidates who embody the highest standards of personal and professional integrity and ethics and are committed to a culture of transparency and open  communication at the Board level and throughout the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Successful candidates are dedicated to accountability and continuous improvement with a belief in innovation as a  key business success factor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They are also actively engaged and have an innate intellectual curiosity and entrepreneurial spirit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of its annual evaluation process for director nominees, the Nominating Committee considers other criteria, including the candidate's history of achievement and superior  standards, ability to think strategically, willingness to share examples based upon experience, policy-making experience, and ability to articulate a point-of-view, take tough  positions and constructively challenge management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors must also be committed to actively engaging in their Board roles, with sufficient time to carry out the duties of Board  https://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/0000764478/000076447817000011/bbydefinitiveproxy2017.htm  45/178
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Document
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: and Board committee membership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Finally, one or more of our directors must possess the education or experience required to qualify as an audit committee financial expert   pursuant to SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Corporate Governance Principles establish our policy of considering diversity in the director identification and nomination process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When considering Board candidates, the  Nominating Committee seeks nominees with a broad range of experience from a variety of industries and professional disciplines, such as finance, professional services, and  technology, along with a diversity of gender, ethnicity, age and geographic location.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating Committee does not assign specific weights to

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that diversity in the backgrounds and qualifications of Board members ensures the mix of experience, knowledge and abilities necessary for the Board to fulfill  its responsibilities and leads to a more effective oversight and decision-making process.

sentences.text: You may vote for all, some or none of the nominees for election to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the nominees  has agreed to continue serving as a director if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if any nominee becomes unwilling or unable to serve and the Board elects to fill the vacancy, the Proxy Agents  named in the proxy will vote for an alternative person nominated by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Articles prohibit cumulative voting, which means you can vote only once for any nominee.

sentences.text: SECTION 16(a) BENEFICIAL OWNERSHIP REPORTING COMPLIANCE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Section 16(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 requires that our directors, executive officers and shareholders who beneficially own more than 10% of our common stock file  initial reports of ownership with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They must also file reports of changes in ownership with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, they are required by SEC regulations to provide us copies  of all Section 16(a) reports that they file with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based solely on a review of such Section 16(a) reports, management and the Board believe our directors, executive officers  and shareholders who beneficially own more than 10% of our common stock complied with the Section 16(a) filing requirements during the fiscal year ended January 28, 2017.

sentences.text: CERTAIN RELATIONSHIPS AND RELATED PARTY TRANSACTIONS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Related Party Transactions Policy prohibits "related party transactions" unless approved by the Audit Committee and the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For purposes of our policy, a "related party  transaction" is a transaction or series of transactions in which
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) the Company or a subsidiary is a participant,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) the aggregate amount involved exceeds $120,000 and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) any  director, executive officer or shareholder beneficially owning more than 5% of our common stock, or any of their respective immediate family members has a direct or indirect  material interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A related party transaction will generally not be approved unless it provides us with a demonstrable incremental benefit and the terms are competitive with those available from  unaffiliated third parties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Only Board members who do not have an interest in the transaction are permitted to vote on a related party transaction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, ongoing related party  transactions are reviewed by the Audit Committee and the Board to ensure that such transactions continue to provide the necessary incremental benefit to us and have competitive  terms.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the transactions discussed below were approved (or re-approved if ongoing) by the Audit Committee and the Board in March 2017, unless otherwise noted, in  accordance with our Related Party Transactions Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have any credit arrangements between our officers, directors, controlling persons and other insiders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Richard M. Schulze
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of the date of this filing, Mr. Schulze owned approximately 13.5% of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On March 25, 2013, we entered into a letter agreement with Mr. Schulze pursuant to  which, among other things, Mr. Schulze was given the lifetime honorary title of "Founder and Chairman Emeritus" of the Company, although he is not an executive and is no longer  a member of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this letter agreement, we agreed to compensate Mr. Schulze with an annual base salary of $150,000 through fiscal 2018 for his services as Chairman  Emeritus, and to provide lifetime medical benefits for him, his spouse and his eligible dependents in accordance with our plans, practices, programs and policies in effect generally  for our executives and their dependents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also agreed to provide office space and administrative support, and to reimburse Mr. Schulze for his costs and out-of-pocket expenses  incurred in the performance of his duties as Chairman Emeritus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The letter agreement's term expired when Mr. Schulze reached the age of 75 (which occurred in January 2016),  except as specifically described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During the beginning of fiscal 2017, we had ongoing lease obligations for one of our former U.S. Best Buy store locations leased from Mr. Schulze.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In April 2016, with Audit  Committee and Board approval, we entered into a lease termination agreement for this location in which we agreed to pay a termination fee of approximately $300,000 in exchange  for a release from our future rent and other obligations under the lease (which totaled approximately $1.1 million).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2017, we paid aggregate rent and lease termination  fees of approximately $427,000 for this former store location.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ryan Green, Mr. Schulze's step-son, is employed with us as a Senior Director in our Properties department at our corporate headquarters in Richfield, Minnesota.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Green's total  cash compensation for fiscal 2017 was approximately $229,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Green also received an annual long-term incentive award of 2,300 time-based restricted shares, which vest in  one-third increments on each anniversary of the grant for three years, and which award is consistent for other employees at his level.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Green is eligible to receive employee  benefits generally available to all employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Green's employment with us began in August 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Schulze's family member is compensated at a level comparable to the  compensation paid to non-family members in similar positions at Best Buy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of beneficially  owning more than 5% of our common stock, Fidelity is currently considered a related party under our Related Party Transactions Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain affiliates of Fidelity provide  services to us in connection with the record keeping and administration of our stock plans (including the Employee Stock Purchase Plan and the Long-Term Incentive Plan).

sentences.text: We  paid these entities approximately $528,000 for these services for fiscal 2017.

sentences.text: The administrative services contracts were initially entered into prior to Fidelity's Schedule 13G filing  and 5% holder status.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The contracts were negotiated at arm's length, and there is no indication that the Company or Fidelity received preferential treatment as a result of the  relationship.

sentences.text: No member of the Audit Committee serves on the audit committee of more than three public companies.

sentences.text: Committee Meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee met eight times during fiscal 2017, including four times via conference call.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee schedules its meetings to ensure it has sufficient time to  devote appropriate attention to all of its tasks.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee meetings include regular executive sessions with our independent registered public accounting firm, Deloitte &  Touche LLP ("D&T"), our internal auditors and management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee also discusses with our internal auditors and D&T the overall scope and plans for their  respective audits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Recommendation Regarding Financial Statements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee, on behalf of the Board, reviewed and discussed with both management and D&T our annual audited consolidated financial statements for the fiscal year  ended January 28, 2017, and our quarterly operating results for each quarter in such fiscal year, along with the related significant accounting and disclosure issues.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit  Committee has discussed with the independent auditors the matters required to be discussed by Public Company Accounting Oversight Board Auditing Standard No. 1301  "Communications with Audit Committees."
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee reviewed and discussed with D&T its independence from us and our management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of that review, the Audit Committee received from D&T the  written disclosures and the letter required by applicable rules of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (U.S.) regarding the independent accountant's communications  with audit committees concerning independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee reviewed all services provided by and the amount of fees paid to D&T in fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In reliance  on the reviews and discussions with management and D&T, the Audit Committee believes that the services provided by D&T were compatible with, and did not impair, its  independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the reviews and discussions referred to above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board, and the Board approved, that our annual audited consolidated financial  statements be included in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for the period ended January 28, 2017, as filed with the SEC.
